title: Las Vegas Raiders, Health Tips, The Sage, Growing Up and more
itunes:title: Las Vegas Raiders, Health Tips, The Sage, Growing Up and more
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The Chief Love Officer must address too many tears. Cesar is in big trouble because he has a huge lawsuit against him. Big Dog got some secrets for you on how to stay healthy. Attention California and that is all! The Raiders get the W in OT and is the city of sin calling Steve or nah? Girls Who Rule The World Day 2021 was a hit. Who from your childhood is unforgettable? Today Big Dog wraps up the show with a simple message.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
